languages.text: {n}Ульфар внезапно сводит брови и растерянно добавляет:{/n} "Ты, конечно, дева, не "отец"... Но слова для девы-командира у нас просто нет, ведь все Космические волки — мужи".
{n}Ulfar suddenly frowns and adds haltingly,{/n} "You, of course, are a maiden, not a father... but we have no word meaning 'maiden commander' in our tongue, as all Space Wolves are men."
languages.original_text: {n}Ульфар внезапно сводит брови и растерянно добавляет:{/n} "Ты, конечно, дева, не "отец"... Но слова для девы-командира у нас просто нет, ведь все Космические волки — мужи".

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar suddenly frowns and adds haltingly,{/n} "In truth, the literal translation from Fenrisian is 'house father'. You, of course, are a maiden, not a father... but we have no word meaning 'maiden commander' in our tongue, as all Space Wolves are men."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar suddenly frowns and adds haltingly,{/n} "In truth, the literal translation from Fenrisian is 'house father'. You, of course, are a maiden, not a father... but we have no word meaning 'maiden commander' in our tongue, as all Space Wolves are men."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar suddenly frowns and adds haltingly,{/n} "In truth, the literal translation from Fenrisian is 'house father'. You, of course, are a maiden, not a father... but we have no word meaning 'maiden commander' in our tongue, as all Space Wolves are men."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar suddenly frowns and adds haltingly,{/n} "You, of course, are a maiden, not a father... but we have no word meaning 'maiden commander' in our tongue, as all Space Wolves are men."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar suddenly frowns and adds haltingly,{/n} "You, of course, are a maiden, not a father... but we have no word meaning 'maiden commander' in our tongue, as all Space Wolves are men."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar frunce el ceño y añade en tono dubitativo:{/n} «Si bien está claro que usted es una doncella y no un padre... no tenemos una palabra para "doncella comandante", puesto que todos los Lobos Espaciales somos hombres».
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar suddenly frowns and adds haltingly,{/n} "You, of course, are a maiden, not a father... but we have no word meaning 'maiden commander' in our tongue, as all Space Wolves are men."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar frunce el ceño y añade en tono dubitativo:{/n} «A decir verdad, la traducción literal del fenrisiano es "padre de la casa". Si bien está claro que usted es una doncella y no un padre... no tenemos una palabra para "doncella comandante", puesto que todos los Lobos Espaciales somos hombres».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}乌尔法突然皱起眉头，支支吾吾地补充道。{/n}“当然，你是个姑娘，不是男人……但我们的语言里没有‘女性指挥官’这个词，因为所有太空野狼都是男人。”
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar suddenly frowns and adds haltingly,{/n} "You, of course, are a maiden, not a father... but we have no word meaning 'maiden commander' in our tongue, as all Space Wolves are men."

traits.locale_text: {n}乌尔法突然皱起眉头，支支吾吾地补充道。{/n}“事实上，‘狼领’这个词，在芬里斯语的直译是‘男性族长’。当然，你是个姑娘，不是男人……但我们的语言里没有‘女性指挥官’这个词，因为所有太空野狼都是男人。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}ウルファーは突然眉をひそめ、ためらいつつもこう付け加えた。{/n}「あんたが女なのは分かってる…だが、俺たちの言語には『女性司令官』を意味する言葉はないんだ。なんせ、 スペースウルフは全員男なもんでな」
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar suddenly frowns and adds haltingly,{/n} "You, of course, are a maiden, not a father... but we have no word meaning 'maiden commander' in our tongue, as all Space Wolves are men."

traits.locale_text: {n}ウルファーは突然眉をひそめ、ためらいつつもこう付け加えた。{/n}「あんたが女なのは分かってる…だが、俺たちの言語には『女性司令官』を意味する言葉はないんだ。なんせ、 スペースウルフは全員男なもんでな」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar se renfrogne subitement et ajoute d'un ton hésitant :{/n} « S'il est vrai qu'en l'occurrence, vous êtes une jeune femme, et non un père, nous n'avons pas de mot pour le dire dans notre langue, car tous les Space Wolves sont des hommes. »
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar suddenly frowns and adds haltingly,{/n} "You, of course, are a maiden, not a father... but we have no word meaning 'maiden commander' in our tongue, as all Space Wolves are men."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar se renfrogne subitement et ajoute d'un ton hésitant :{/n} « À vrai dire, la traduction littérale de l'expression fenrisienne est "père de foyer". S'il est vrai qu'en l'occurrence, vous êtes une jeune femme, et non un père, nous n'avons pas de mot pour le dire dans notre langue, car tous les Space Wolves sont des hommes. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar verzieht plötzlich das Gesicht und fügt stockend hinzu:{/n} "Ihr seid natürlich eine Maid, kein Vater ... doch wir haben in unserer Sprache kein Wort für 'weiblichen Kommandant', da alle Space Wolves Männer sind."
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar suddenly frowns and adds haltingly,{/n} "You, of course, are a maiden, not a father... but we have no word meaning 'maiden commander' in our tongue, as all Space Wolves are men."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar runzelt plötzlich die Stirn und fügt stockend hinzu:{/n} "In Wahrheit lautet die wörtliche Übersetzung aus dem Fenrisischen 'Hausvater'. Ihr seid natürlich eine Maid, kein Vater ... doch wir haben in unserer Sprache kein Wort für 'weiblichen Kommandant', da alle Space Wolves Männer sind."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar suddenly frowns and adds haltingly,{/n} "You, of course, are a maiden, not a father... but we have no word meaning 'maiden commander' in our tongue, as all Space Wolves are men."

languages.text: {n}Ulfar aniden suratını asıyor ve duraksayarak konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Tabii sen dişisin, baba değilsin... Fakat bizim dilimizde 'dişi komutan' anlamına gelen bir kelime bulunmaz çünkü tüm Uzay Kurtları erkektir."
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar suddenly frowns and adds haltingly,{/n} "You, of course, are a maiden, not a father... but we have no word meaning 'maiden commander' in our tongue, as all Space Wolves are men."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar aniden suratını asıyor ve duraksayarak konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Tabii sen dişisin, baba değilsin... Fakat bizim dilimizde 'dişi komutan' anlamına gelen bir kelime bulunmaz çünkü tüm Uzay Kurtları erkektir."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
